short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will help identify keywords of plants that are toxic to cats and dogs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Want to buy flowers or household plants online but not sure if they are toxic to dogs/cats? Let our extension help you.

This extension will check the content of a page and detect if there are any keywords that reference a plant that's known to be toxic to household pets. This will stop you from buying any plants or flowers that may pose a threat to your dog or cat.
